title: Lupin Announces New Center of Excellence for Inhalation Research in Florida
author: Justin Reynolds
description: MUMBAI and CORAL SPRINGS, Florida, August 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Pharma Major Lupin Limited (Lupin) today announced the opening of its new Center of Excellence for Inhalation Research in Coral... | MUMBAI and CORAL SPRINGS, Florida, August 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Pharma Major Lupin Limited (Lupin) today announced the opening of its new Center of Excellence for Inhalation Research in Coral...
